name: Save new CloudTalk contacts to a Google Sheets spreadsheet
description: Every time a new contact is created in CloudTalk, Make will automatically add it to a new row in a Google Sheet spreadsheet. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1YJaX6XuRX4XghefX9oYglUjb6ZcUOygfCjRwkCOF6Lw/edit?usp=sharing).
